## Public Member Functions

### handleDiagnostics() {#a9e6c506af27aa3eacbc224662cd5e57d}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool llvm::lto::LTOLLVMDiagnosticHandler::handleDiagnostics (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/diagnosticinfo">DiagnosticInfo</a> &amp; DI)</>}
  labels = {["inline", "virtual"]}>
Override handleDiagnostics to provide custom implementation.

Return true if it handles diagnostics reporting properly otherwise return false to make <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/llvmcontext/#aad03ef5cfbe6e7cad076d9e45ba06592">LLVMContext::diagnose()</a> to print the message with a prefix based on the severity.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/lto/config-h/#l00289">289</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/lto/config-h">Config.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

</SectionDefinition>
